update.checking: Checking for updates in the background...
update.available: An update is available. Click here to download it.
update.downloaded: An update is ready to install when you quit.

drop_cover.text: Drop a mod here to install it

sync_overlay.title: Synchronising your save data...
sync_overlay.description: Please be patient. If you have a lot of save states, this may take up to several minutes.

onboarding.title: Welcome!
onboarding.description_download: Let's find a copy of DDLC.
onboarding.description_why: Doki Doki Mod Manager requires a copy of DDLC as a .zip file. If you already have a copy of DDLC, you can choose it now, otherwise a new copy will be downloaded directly from itch.io. We can't directly distribute DDLC, so this is the next best thing.
onboarding.description_unexpected: If you aren't expecting this, you may have a corrupt version of the game downloaded. Try downloading it again.
onboarding.status_downloading: Downloading game files - {0} complete ({1} left, {2} MB/s)
onboarding.status_errored: The download failed, or was interrupted. Check your internet connection and try again.
onboarding.status_offline: You need an active internet connection to download DDLC.
onboarding.description_location: Your games will be stored at {0}

login_input.details: An email will be sent to this address. Click the link in the email to finish logging in.

change_username_input.details: Usernames don't have to be unique.

uninstall_confirmation.message: Are you sure you want to uninstall?
uninstall_confirmation.details: Your save data for {0} will be deleted, and you will need a copy of the mod to install it again.

launch_lock_confirmation.message: The cloud save file is in use!
launch_lock_confirmation.details: If you launch now, you may lose your progress.

launch_noauth_confirmation.details: If you launch now, your save file will not sync to the cloud.

launch_offline_confirmation.details: If you launch now, your save file will not sync to the cloud.

mod_delete_confirmation.message: Are you sure you want to delete the mod?
mod_delete_confirmation.details: You will need to download another copy of the mod to install it again.

save_delete_confirmation.message: Are you sure you want to delete your save data?
save_delete_confirmation.details: You will have to start {0} again from scratch.

install.description_locked: You are playing with this cloud save file on a different computer. To continue here, stop playing on the other computer.
install.description_achievements: Keep playing to unlock more achievements.
install.description_screenshots: Press S while playing to take a screenshot.
install.description_sdk: This mod supports special features with the Doki Doki Mod Manager SDK!

install_creation.title: Install DDLC
install_creation.description_mod: Click to browse for a mod.
install_creation.description_vanilla: A clean copy of DDLC will be created. The save data will be separate from any other copy of the game.
install_creation.description_vanilla_global_save: A clean copy of DDLC will be created. The save data will be shared with other copies of the game (e.g. Steam)
install_creation.description_vanilla_cloudsave: A clean copy of DDLC will be created. The save data will be stored in the cloud.
install_creation.description_modded: A copy of DDLC will be created, and the mod will be installed.  The save data will be separate from any other copy of the game.
install_creation.description_modded_global_save: A copy of DDLC will be created, and the mod will be installed.  The save data will be shared with other copies of the game (e.g. Steam)
install_creation.description_modded_cloudsave: A copy of DDLC will be created, and the mod will be installed. The save data will be stored in the cloud.
install_creation.status_exists: That folder already exists. Pick another folder name.

tab_store_placeholder.title: The store is coming soon!
tab_store_placeholder.description_1: The Sayonika mod database will provide a central location to share, download and review DDLC mods. When Sayonika is publicly available, you'll be able to browse mods right here in Doki Doki Mod Manager.
tab_store_placeholder.description_2: While you wait, feel free to download some of these recommended mods.
tab_store_placeholder.error: Failed to load the list of mods. Are you offline?

section_backgrounds.title: Background
section_backgrounds.subtitle: Customise your copy of Doki Doki Mod Manager with one of these backgrounds.
section_backgrounds.description_credit: Original DDLC backgrounds courtesy of Team Salvato.

section_cloudsaves.title: Cloud Save Management
section_cloudsaves.subtitle: Manage your cloud save data.
section_cloudsaves.description_no_saves: You don't have any cloud saves yet. To create a new cloud save file, install a mod with the Cloud Save option.

section_storage.title: Storage Location
section_storage.subtitle: Change where your game data is stored.
section_storage.description_moving: Warning! If you choose to change your install location, all your mods, installations and save data will be moved. This may take several minutes, and cannot be interrupted.

section_updates.title: Updates
section_updates.subtitle: Get the latest version of Doki Doki Mod Manager.

section_sdk.title: Achievements & SDK
section_sdk.subtitle: Change the way achievements are handled.
section_sdk.checkbox_specified: When the mod specifies it supports them

section_discord.title: Discord Rich Presence
section_discord.subtitle: Share which mod you're playing with your Discord friends.
section_discord.description: Changes will take effect after restarting Doki Doki Mod Manager.

section_testing.title: SDK Debug
section_testing.subtitle: Enable debug logging to test your mods with the Doki Doki Mod Manager SDK.

cloudsave_delete_prompt.details: If you delete {0}, you will lose it, unless you have an installed copy.

tab_about.title: About
tab_about.description: Doki Doki Mod Manager is a community-developed project that helps you find, install and play mods for Doki Doki Literature Club, a free Visual Novel game by Team Salvato.
tab_about.disclaimer_1: Doki Doki Mod Manager is a fan work of Doki Doki Literature Club and is not affiliated with Team Salvato. It is a fan work, as defined by Team Salvato's IP Guidelines.
tab_about.disclaimer_2: Doki Doki Mod Manager does not take responsibility for any damage caused to your files or computer, as a result of playing a mod or otherwise. It is up to you to ensure mods are safe to play.
tab_about.description_support: Doki Doki Mod Manager will always be free to download and use. If you like it and want to help me keep it updated, consider supporting me in one of the following ways.
tab_about.support_steelseries: Get 10% off SteelSeries gaming peripherals (affiliate link)
tab_about.support_code: Contribute to the project (code or translations)

jumplist.task_launch: Open Doki Doki Mod Manager and launch {0}.

running_cover.description_running: Close the game to make changes to your mods.
running_cover.install_missing: The install could not be found.
running_cover.install_corrupt: The install is incomplete or corrupt.
running_cover.install_crashed: The game failed to launch or crashed.

game_browse_dialog.title: Locate a copy of DDLC's zip file

shortcut_dialog.title: Choose where to place your shortcut

exception.title: Doki Doki Mod Manager crashed
exception.body: The problem has been reported. Please restart and try again.

move_install.title: Failed to move install folder
move_install.body: Check that you have permission and enough space to move to this folder.

shortcut.title: Failed to create shortcut
shortcut.body: Check that you have permission to create files in this folder.

install.title: Failed to install game
install.body: Check that you have permission and enough space to install.

rename.title: Failed to rename
rename.body: Check that you have closed all programs that may be interfering and try again.

uninstall.title: Failed to uninstall
uninstall.body: Check that you have closed all programs that may be interfering and try again.

save_delete.title: Failed to delete save data
save_delete.body: Check that you have closed all programs that may be interfering and try again.

mod_delete.title: Failed to delete the mod
mod_delete.body: Check that you have closed all programs that may be interfering and try again.

renderer_freeze.title: Doki Doki Mod Manager stopped responding
renderer_freeze.body: If this issue lasts for a long time, close the app and start again.
